amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill any rule that the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job creation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 112-311 to exempt any rule that the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job creation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 236 (Roll no. 895).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 236 (Roll no. 895).
